info.name: Linguistic Layers
info.attribution:
Room layout and design by LawDawg and released to the public domain by CC0.

The library image and card back image generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using the following prompt: "a staircase made from books, pastel watercolor painting"
info.description: Build layers of cards and try to think of words that fit into the increasingly complex restrictions. Use special cards to shake things up. Claim the stack to steal the points from other players.
info.helpText: Sit in seats. Press restart button in upper right hand corner. Cards will automatically be dealt to player hands and to either 5 (1-2 player) or 7 (3-4 players) starting stacks. Points for each stack are indicated at the top. To claim the stack, drag a cube to the holder at the top of the stack. If a cube is already there, it will automatically be moved to the discard pile.

5.textTop: Made up of 2 or more words
5.textBottom: Changing 1 letter will make a new word

9.textBottom: Same number of vowels and consonants

12.textTop: Has a J, M, or X

15.textTop: Does not have ST or CH

20.textBottom: Does not have an O or U

22.textBottom: Adding a letter makes a new word

37.textTop: Does not have EA or ND

40.textTop: Ends with C, L, or W

43.textBottom: Can be a noun or a verb

51.textBottom: Removing 1-2 letters makes a new word

52.textTop: Does not have any double letters

fields.text: This will reset the board and start a new game. Are you sure?

fgnj.html:
Special Cards

Look

Press button to look at the top 4 cards in deck. Choose one for your hand. The rest are returned to the top of the deck. You can manually rearrange the order of those 3 cards if you want. Do not claim a stack.

Move

Take any uncovered card from a stack and move it to top of another stack and claim that stack. You may rotate the card if it is not a special card. If you move the only card in a stack, start a new stack with next card from deck but do not claim it.

Remove

Take any card from any stack and suffle it into the deck. Do not claim a stack. Draw card from deck and take another turn. If you move the only card in a stack, start a new stack with the next card from the deck but do not claim it.

Rotate

Rotate any uncovered non-special card. Claim the stack.

Swap

Swap any two uncovered cards and claim both stacks. Do not rotate the cards.

Switch

Take any card from any stack into your hand. Place another card from your hand onto the top of that stack and claim it.

fields.text: Cards shown in order with top card first.
